patterns.name: entity.name.class
patterns.match: \b(release message as positive posting|register response parameter|set pacs008 payment values|select auto complete item|set unique instruction id|submit interface response|switch to default content|register table parameter|close all child windows|send interface response|create pacs008 payment|set details of charges|skip gpp tour reminder|wait for windows count|invoke message action|select from combo box|create mt103 message|invoke business flow|set creditor account|invoke oracle query|download resources|find and set value|get message status|register parameter|set debtor account|set text box value|get business date|set random amount|get message data|navigate forward|switch to window|wait for element|move to element|switch to alert|switch to frame|copy parameter|create payment|delete request|execute script|get screenshot|search payment|select payment|submit payment|verify message|close browser|close session|context click|finastra ping|hide keyboard|invoke button|navigate back|patch request|select option|skip gpp tour|try send keys|wait for page|close window|double click|geo location|kill process|open payment|post request|set currency|wait for url|get request|submit form|upload file|gpp logout|long swipe|go to url|gpp login|no action|send keys|try click|keyboard|refresh|scroll|click|swipe|wait)\b

patterns.name: entity.name.function
patterns.match: ((?<=\{)android ui automator(?=})|(?<=\{)android data matcher(?=})|(?<=\{)android view matcher(?=})|(?<=\{)windows automation(?=})|(?<=\{)ios ui automation(?=})|(?<=\{)partial link text(?=})|(?<=\{)accessibility id(?=})|(?<=\{)tizen automation(?=})|(?<=\{)ios ns predicate(?=})|(?<=\{)ios class chain(?=})|(?<=\{)response body(?=})|(?<=\{)css selector(?=})|(?<=\{)status code(?=})|(?<=\{)text length(?=})|(?<=\{)class name(?=})|(?<=\{)attribute(?=})|(?<=\{)link text(?=})|(?<=\{)selected(?=})|(?<=\{)tag name(?=})|(?<=\{)enabled(?=})|(?<=\{)visible(?=})|(?<=\{)binding(?=})|(?<=\{)driver(?=})|(?<=\{)exists(?=})|(?<=\{)x path(?=})|(?<=\{)count(?=})|(?<=\{)stale(?=})|(?<=\{)title(?=})|(?<=\{)image(?=})|(?<=\{)model(?=})|(?<=\{)date(?=})|(?<=\{)text(?=})|(?<=\{)name(?=})|(?<=\{)from(?=})|(?<=\{)url(?=})|(?<=\{)xml(?=})|(?<=\{)id(?=}))
